text: Generoso Pompa (born 11 March 1952 in Alexandria), also known as Gene (pseudonym), is an Italian painter of contemporary art.Encyclopedia of italian art, Gene Pompa, born 11 March 1952 in Alexandria. ==Bibliography== * Monograph, Gene Pompa: meraviglie di natura, by Giovanni Faccenda, Cairo, Milan, 2013. . * Monograph, Gene Pompa by Vittorio Sgarbi, EA Editore, Palermo, 2016. * Monograph, Dossier Gene, by Philippe Daverio, Art Now, Palermo, 2020. Monograph, Dossier Gene, by Philippe Daverio, Art Now, Palermo, 2020, Opac Galleria d'Arte Moderna e Contemporanea, Roma. * Catalog of Modern Art No. 53, in Giovanni Faccenda, "The Italian Astist from the early twentieth century to today"( Gli Artisti Italiani dal Primo Novecento ad Oggi) Giorgio Mondadori, Milan, 2017, pp. 400–401. . * Catalog of Modern Art No. 54, in Giovanni Faccenda, "The Italian Artists from the early twentieth century to today"( Gli Artisti Italiani dal Primo Novecento ad Oggi) Giorgio Mondadori, Milan, 2018, pp. 411–412. . * Catalog of Modern Art No. 55, in Giovanni Faccenda, "The Italian Artists from the early twentieth century to today"( Gli Artisti Italiani dal Primo Novecento ad Oggi) Giorgio Mondadori, Milan, 2019, pp. 392–393. . * Monograph, Gene: Collana SIGNA ARTIS, by Philippe Daverio, Giovanni Faccenda, Vittorio Sgarbi, Giammarco Puntelli, Editore Giorgio Mondadori, Milan, 2020. . ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Italian painters Category:People from Alexandria Category:Living people
title: Generoso Pompa
